ComicInfo.Title: The Moldin Girls; Pretend Zebras; The Transdeformers vs Boltron; Cracked Interviews Steven Schpielberg, the Movie King!; Celebrity Phobias!; Before Heimlich!; Squeeeal of Fortune!!; Cracked Sports Profile; New Cracked Dances; Rock n' Roll Word Plays; Messed up by Modern Times; The Rubber Duck; The Cracked World of Vic Martin; Cracked Movie VI: A New Beginning; One Night at the Statue of Liberty
ComicInfo.Summary: Hudd and Dini pretend to be zebras to avoid being recaptured but the guard has dressed up as a zebra.
